description:
Description:

	-Pet nail grinding wheel made of Emery can quickly and safely trim your pet's nails.
	It is safer and more effective than dog nail clippers.

	-The trimmer features an adjustable low-high speed design powerful enough support heavy grinding.

	-Due to low noise technology, it can keep pets calmer when using grinder.It reduces the fear of trimming your toenails and allows your pet to enjoy the process of trimming nails.

		Method of use:
	
		Step 1: According to the size and characteristics of your pet's nails, choose suitable nail Polish Hole
	
		Step 2: With one hand holding the Nail Polisher, with the other hand, place the pet's nail near the nail Polish hole and begin to Polish
	
		Step 3: anticlockwise direction the Nail Polisher by removing the inner cover, opening the Polisher, and cleaning the nail polisher with paper or a cloth
	
		If it is the first time to Polish your pet's nails, it is recommended to first cut off the pet's long or sharp nails, but not too much to avoid bleeding
	
		For the safety of your pet, each manicure should last no longer than 5 seconds, and the angle of the manicure should be adjusted

products_name: 100Pcs/Bag Cat Grass Seeds
description:
Features:
	Cat grass, a schizonepeta plant, because cats like to eat, it is also known as catnip.

	Cat grass for cats
	 

	(1) Help to discharge the hair bulbs and reduce the accumulation of hairballs → After the cats have eaten the cat grass, the cat grass flips in the stomach to help spit out the hair balls.

	(2) increase plant fiber → can help digestion and regulate gastrointestinal health.

	(3) Supplement vitamins → cat grass contains plant vitamin C and chlorophyll.

	(4) soothing stomach upset → can help cats soothe mild stomach upset such as stomach up, stomach and so on.
	Specifications :
	
		Quantity : 100 pcs
	
		Germination time : 5-7 days
	
		For germination temperature :  15-20 Celsius.
	
		Package : 1 PP Simple Packaging
	
		Applications :  Balcony, garden, living room, study, windows, office, etc.
		
			How To Grow The Seeds?
		
			Before planting, the seeds need to fill in the planting bed foot of water, irrigation to soil for 8-10 cm deep soil moisture saturation is appropriate. According to the growth of the seedlings and then watering right amount of water, prevent soil compaction. After the bottom water infiltration, the bed surface thin layer of fine soil sprinkle sifted. Usually they sow, drilling and on-demand. Immediately after sowing casing, casing fine sieved soil use. Overburden thickness of about 0.8-1.0 cm, Bo Hou uniform. After sowing, then 8 grams per square meter seedbed 50% carbendazim WP fine soil mix evenly spread thin in the bed surface, can prevent seedling damping-off occurs, the seeds did not germinate during the nursery beds should be watered frequently to seeds will begin to germinate in 5-7 days.
		
			 
		
			Tips :
		
			Soaked in warm water for 8 hours before planting will be better if the seeds is over 0.5mm.
		
			Because the seeds are in dormant state and need to absorb enough water to germination.
		
			 
		
			Package Includes :
		
			1 x Egrow 100Pcs Cat Grass Seeds 
	
	 

	Seed germination is affected by many factors such as environment, region, temperature and humidity, seeding medium, and individual sowing skills, which may result in different seeding results of the same batch of seeds. The images are only a reference.

	Brand New and high quality.

	Cleaning Tips:

	① Transfer sisal carpet to the outside and shake off the dust on the surface. Or use a vacuum cleaner.

	(Tips: before cleaning, you can sprinkle a little salt, with dust suppression flying function. Because the salt can absorb dust, even small dust can also clean up clean. At the same time, it can also make carpets more durable, and always maintain colorful colors.)

	② Eliminate the peculiar smell of pet on carpet:

	Add a small amount of soda water in 4 liters of warm water(about 86℉), soak with towel, wring dry and wipe it. Not only can prevent carpet discoloration or fading, but also can eliminate the smell of pets. After you've finished, put it in a ventilated place and dry it.

description:

	2. MALES VS. FEMALES - After Surgery Wear has a cut in the back to allow most female animals to urinate/excrete while wearing the product. To ensure the abdominal area is fully protected, the product does not have an opening for male animals to urinate. Before going on a walk or letting male animals outside, the product must be partially removed from the back legs and retied along the body (see picture in listing).

Fabrics are 100% pure cotton and hypoallergenic to prevent skin irritation. Machine washable (before washing, tie a knot at the end of each string to minimize fraying).

	Feature:

	2. The principle of the fabric: The cool fabric adjusts the temperature by absorbing heat, and the cool factor gives the pet a cool and comfortable feeling.

	3. The fabric does not contain chemicals, polymer materials, glues, crystals or phase change materials. The fibers used are all safe and non-irritating fibers. This fabric is lighter, breathable, and comfortable to wear than ordinary moisture-proof fabrics.

	4. If you put it in the water and tumble dry it, put it in the freezer for 10 minutes and then remove it. The cooling effect is more obvious.

products_name: Double Handle Dog Leash Dual Handle Heavy Duty Soft Padded Reflective Nylon Walking Training
description:
The leash is designed for a long-term use! This 5-7mm thick leash is relatively more resistant to chewing. It is thicker than average leashes, and made ultra-strong reinforced with two layers of quality nylon and neoprene. Whether on an early morning walk or a late night run the reflective piping on the edges of the leash will maximize your companion’s visibility in low-light conditions. Two soft padded handles: Use the primary handle for casual walks, and the traffic control handle for crowded areas or in traffic which requires higher supervision. Both handles are delicately soft padded and good for the long walk!
Material: Nylon

products_name: Ant Maze 3D Insect Farm House Educational Nursery Watch Liv
description:
Description:

	
		Name: The ant insect ecology pet toys
	
		Material: Plastic, Nutrition Jell
	
		Size: 12x3x10.5cm
	
		Shape: Rectangle
		 


	The energy for the ant is from the fantasy color gelatin which filled in the clear case. It supplies the water and the alimentation to the ant. We can see the process that how the ant work in the 3d tunnel through the clear box. During the ant working, you will find out a lot of interesting secrets you never see in the ant world: how they work, communicate, rest, eat and fight etc., that is the best feeling you never find. For children, they can improve their mind, observing ability and thinking ability, bring them the interest in starting to explore the human and nature.

	 

	Note:

	The ant is live in the Damp, dark place, please avoid the strong sunshine

	This ant maze requires 6-12 mm ants and ants that has a habit of digging holes, for example, some arboreal ants may not work Different groups of ants put together may cause fight Some would be killed;.. Some would be injured; and both are not suitable for breeding.

	Put 15-20 ants measuring 6 mm or less or 10 ants measuring 8 mm or larger in it. Usually, ants will start working after 24-28 hours. The best temperature is 25 ~ 30 ° C. If the temperature is below 20 ° C, ants may rarely work.

	 

	Gel Instructions: 

	- The gel dosage is absolutely exquisite, the transparency is high

	- The gel can be used repeatedly, and the container can be dissolved in the microwave oven or boiling water. The container will not be deformed, and then the new product will be dissolved.

	 

	Package:

	1 x Ant home

	1 x Magnifying glass

	1 x Manual

	1 x Ant transfers pipe

products_name: Anti-Bark No Bark Electric Vibration Training Collar
description:
Feature:
●Easy and convenient to test the functionality and sensitivity by blowing.
●Indinite sensitivity adjustable by gear to suit for different dogs.
●2 training modes: beeper and static shock.
●7 different combinations of beeper and static shock to train dogs effectively.
●The collar turns into 1-minute-automatic protection mode after 7 times consecutive working.
●Adjustable leather leash from 6  to 30  to suit for different dogs: small ;medium and large.
Product Attributes:
Material:PVC
Color:As the picture shown
Quantity: 1 Pcs
Size: 7.8X3.4X3.8cm/3*1.3*1.4 inch
Package Include:
1 x Bark Stop Controller
1 x Adjustable Strap
2 Pairs of Test probe
1 x Test light
1 x 6V alkaline battery
1 X English Manual
Principles of operation:
At the first bark,collar applies a short warning tone.
If a second bark occurs within thirty seconds,a more intense tone is sounded.
From the third bark,a more intense tone is sounded along with a short,mild shock.
This pattern is repeated through 7 correction levels.The first two levels are only with progressively warning tone.If your dog continues to bark through the rest five levels,the more intense sound and shock ;are applies after each bark until your pet stops for thirty seconds,and the Anti-Bark Collar will automatically resets to the first Tone only level of correction.To protect the dog,if the continuous stimulus reaches the 7 levels,then the collar will stop working for 1 minutes.

products_name: 4 pcs Pet Dog Summer Waterproof Shoes
description:
Keep your dog's paws clean, comfortable and well protected
	
		Waterproof, Air Permeable dog shoes
	
		Dog shoes for summer, protect your pet's paw avoid burned or hurt
	
		
			Specification:   
			
				Color: pink, light blue, black
				
					
						Size Charts:
						
							
								
									
										Size
									
										Width (cm)
									
										Length (cm)
								
								
									
										#1
									
										2.6

										4.0

										5.0
								
								
									
										#5
									
										4.2
									
										5.5
								
							
						
					
					
						 
				
				
					 
			
		
	
	
		
			Some experience to share with every buyer:
		
			1. How to measure the paw size of you dog? First put your dog's FRONT paw on a paper, drawing a circle around the paw, then, measure the width and length of the circle , and last add 1CM for both width and length.(If your dog's is a long hair breed or a adult dog, add a little more.)
		
			 
		
			(1)Mark the length and width of his paw on a piece of paper. Place a sheet of paper on a hard surface that your dog can stand on. Only the paw you are measuring needs to be on the paper. When a dog puts pressure on a paw, the pawwill splay so ensure that he is putting weight on the paw you are measuring. If you measure a paw that is not splayed, the shoes will be too small. 
		
			 
		
			(2)You can do this by gently holding the opposite paw in your hand so all the dog's weight is on the paw you are measuring.
		
			 
		
			(3)Clearly mark each side at widest point, and front and back. Don't forget to include the toenails.
		
			 
		
			2. Some dogs are well behaved,they are willing to dress up. But some nauthy dogs, we do not recommended that you consider to buy shoes! ! !They will want to go off, bite, damage the shoes.
		
			 
		
			3.If it's the first time your dog wearing shoes, you must pay closely attention to observe the dog's behavior.If you dog do not know how to walk, you'd better lead them;if your dog start to bite the shoes, you'd better say "NO" to him.When they used to it, everything is OK now. 
			 
		
			Package Included:
		
			1 set (4pcs) x Pet shoes
			 
	

Please Note:
1. Please allow 1-3cm error due to manual measurement.
2. We suggest buyers to pick a larger size when the measurement fall between two size.
3. Please understand that colors may exist chromatic aberration. Thanks for understanding!

description:
Why choose Dog Training Collar?
			
				We love our dogs. For many of us, they are more than pets, they are family. But an untrained dog is not only difficult to live with, they do not know their place in life and can be unhappy. In extreme circumstances, an untrained dog can present a danger to others, particularly children and the elderly!
			
				Choosing a good e-collar training can correct your dog’s behavior whether it’s running away, digging holes, barking, biting, chewing, jumping, scratching, attacking the mailman etc, this shock collar will stop your dog instantly!
				Features: 
				
					Easy to use,ergonomic transmitter
				
					Rainproof receiver for bad weather training
				
					Rechargeable collar and transmitter
				
					4 training modes: static/vibration/beep/flash
				
					Adjustable intensity under static shock/vibration mode from 0 to 7 levels.If the level set 0,the mode is inhibited.
				
					The remote control distance of this product is 800 yards.
				
					Two-dog model allows the trainer to control two dogs from one transmitter.
				Power saving design with automatic standby and memory function.(With memory function,if the transmitter and the receiver do not run out of power,the product can work by just turning on the transmitter and receiver.In this case,there is no need to pair them again.)
